descriptor.name: Rice Hair Oil
descriptor.short_desc: Rice hair oil by WOW Skin Science - cares for your damaged, breakage-prone strands, weak roots and sluggish scalp. This natural and nourishing hair oil nourishes strands and leaves your scalp feeling refreshed and hair soft and manageable, and enveloped in fresh fragrance. This all-natural hair oil delivers the nutrients directly to your roots and protect the weak strands with its conditioning effect. Ideal for managing color-treated, brittle, breakage-prone hair.

descriptor.name: Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo
descriptor.short_desc:
Argan oil shampoo improves your hair-cleansing routine. You'll reduce dandruff, flakes, and frizz while enhancing shine and gloss to your hair. Argan oil shampoo reduces dryness brings back smoothness, restores silkiness and reduces hair loss. Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo protects your hair from styling and boosts hair growth.

Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is rich nourishing anti-dryness shampoo power comes from pure Moroccan argon oil thats rich in vitamin e and fatty acids to gently remove dryness and restore hair health. It is free from toxic sulphates, parabens, and silicones that can damage your scalp and increase the chance of hair loss. Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is with Natural DHT Blockers has been formulated to bring back smoothness, restore silkiness, and reduce hair loss in extra dry hair. It is suitable for all hair types.
descriptor.long_desc:
Argan oil shampoo improves your hair-cleansing routine. You'll reduce dandruff, flakes, and frizz while enhancing shine and gloss to your hair. Argan oil shampoo reduces dryness brings back smoothness, restores silkiness and reduces hair loss. Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo protects your hair from styling and boosts hair growth.

Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is rich nourishing anti-dryness shampoo power comes from pure Moroccan argon oil thats rich in vitamin e and fatty acids to gently remove dryness and restore hair health. It is free from toxic sulphates, parabens, and silicones that can damage your scalp and increase the chance of hair loss. Argan oil shampoo by WOW Skin Science is with Natural DHT Blockers has been formulated to bring back smoothness, restore silkiness, and reduce hair loss in extra dry hair. It is suitable for all hair types.
